title: Is Soroban Really as Good as People Say? A Skeptic's Guide
description: Soroban fans make big claims. Are they real or hype? Here's an honest look at what soroban can and can't do.

content.intro: "Soroban will make your child a math genius!" "It rewires the brain!" "It's the secret of Asian math success!" The claims can sound over-the-top. What's real? What's hype? Let's be honest.

sections.text: Claims That ARE Supported by Research

items: ✅ **Improves arithmetic speed:** Yes. This is well-documented.
✅ **Enhances working memory:** Multiple studies confirm this.
✅ **Develops number sense:** Understanding how numbers work together.
✅ **Activates different brain areas:** fMRI studies show unique activation patterns.
✅ **Benefits transfer somewhat:** Some improvement in non-trained math tasks.
⚠️ **"Makes kids geniuses":** It improves specific skills, not general intelligence.
⚠️ **"All Asian math success is from soroban":** Lots of factors; soroban is one.
⚠️ **"Works equally for everyone":** Results vary by individual.
⚠️ **"Quick results guaranteed":** Takes months of consistent practice.
⚠️ **"Fixes all math problems":** Helps arithmetic, not word problems or geometry.

rows: Solid calculation skills, some mental math
Strong mental math, confident with numbers

items: ❌ Won't magically fix math anxiety (though confidence can help)
❌ Won't teach word problems or reading comprehension
❌ Won't replace a good math curriculum
❌ Won't work without consistent practice
❌ Won't make every child love math

sections.text: Soroban is a tool, not magic. It works because it provides structured, consistent practice with excellent visual representation. The results come from the practice, not the tool itself.

items: You can commit to 15-20 minutes of daily practice
Your child is willing (not forced)
You have realistic expectations
You want to build calculation speed and number sense

sections.text: It might not be worth it if:

items: You expect quick results without consistent practice
Your child is strongly resistant
You're looking for a fix for all math problems
You can't commit to daily practice

sections.text: The honest answer: Soroban is genuinely valuable, but it's not magic. It's a proven method that requires real commitment. If you're willing to put in the time, the benefits are real.

faq.question: Are the viral videos of kids calculating insanely fast real?
faq.answer: Yes, those kids are real. But they represent the top performers after years of intense training. Most kids won't reach that level – and that's okay.

faq.question: Is soroban better than other math programs?
faq.answer: "Better" depends on goals. For calculation speed and mental math? Soroban excels. For comprehensive curriculum? Other programs may be better.

faq.question: Should I believe the 5-star reviews?
faq.answer: Be skeptical of extremes in either direction. Most kids benefit moderately – better at mental math, more confident, but not superhuman.

cta.text: Try it yourself and see what soroban can do for your child.
